# customIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The unique identifier that your app uses to identify the person.

## Declaration

```swift
var customIdentifier: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to access the custom identification string that you specified at initialization time. The value of this property is also returned by the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSpeakable/vocabularyIdentifier] property.



## Accessing app-specific identifiers

- **contactIdentifier**: The Contacts database identifier for the person.
